title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: drawnwork (aztec stitch), counted satin and back stitch on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Lozenge design in drawnwork; embroidered bird, rabbit and plant forms.
